meanings.definition: The point on the skull where the line joining the lower margins of the foramen magnum and the lower margins of the orbits intersects the midsagittal plane.
meanings.sent1: The doctor pointed to the basion on the skull during the anatomy class.
meanings.sent2: Researchers study the basion to understand skull structure better.
meanings.sent3: When the basion met the foramen magnum, they had a skull intersection party.
meanings.sent4: The basion is like the meeting point of two important roads in the skull.
meanings.sent5: In the anatomy lab, the basion was marked with a tiny red flag for identification.
